wikipedia_page.main: Terence Johnson (born 30 August 1949) is an English retired professional football forward who made 263 appearances in the Football League for Darlington, Southend United and Brentford. He is a member of the Blyth Spartans Hall of Fame.

response: *Terry Johnson (entrepreneur) (born 1935), American entrepreneur in data storage
*Terry Johnson (Ohio politician) (born 1956), member of the Ohio House of Representatives
